snippet: Horst Reichenbach, the head of the European Union’s task force on Greece, said the country has made progress but more needs to be done to crack down on tax evasion.
abstract: Horst Reichenbach, head of the European Union’s task force on Greece, says the country has made progress but more needs to be done to crack down on tax evasion; notes 946 million euros ($1.2 billion) was collected in back taxes in 2011, but is a fraction of the potential.
lead_paragraph: Horst Reichenbach, the head of the European Union’s task force on Greece, said the country has made progress but more needs to be done to crack down on tax evasion.

headline.seo: Greece Urged by European Official to Do More
headline.main: Greece Urged by European Official to Do More
headline.print_headline: European Officials See Progress, but Urge Greece to Do More
